name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is a vintage-inspired oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its classic box design, retroConsole buttons, and handDown arms and legs, Retrotron brings a touch of nostalgia to the digital world. Its classic screen allows it to display waveforms and analyze signals with precision. Retrotron is a true representation of the fusion of technology and vintage aesthetics.
